content:
DataBoundControlDesigner Class

In this Article

Provides a base class for design-time support for controls that derive from DataBoundControl.

Syntax

Declaration

public class DataBoundControlDesigner : System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner, System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider, System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ComponentDesigner
  • HtmlControlDesigner
  • ControlDesigner
  • System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner
  • DataBoundControlDesigner

Remarks

Extend the DataBoundControlDesigner class if you want to create a designer for the DataBoundControl Web server control or for a class that extends DataBoundControl.

Constructors summary

DataBoundControlDesigner()

Initializes a new instance of the DataBoundControlDesigner class.

Properties summary

ActionLists

Gets the DesignerActionListCollection object for this designer.
DataMember

Gets the shadowed stem.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember* property of the underlying data-bound control.
DataSourceDesigner

Gets the designer of the data source of the underlying data-bound control.
DesignerView

Gets the DesignerDataSourceView object associated with the data source of this designer.
SampleRowCount

Gets the number of rows that the data-bound control displays on the design surface.
UseDataSourcePickerActionList

Gets a value indicating whether the designer should include "Choose a data source" in its action list.

Methods summary

ConnectToDataSource()

Disconnects events from the previous data source and connects them to the current data source.
CreateDataSource()

Invokes the standard dialog box to create a new data source control, and sets the new data source control's ID to the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID* property of the data-bound control.
DataBind(BaseDataBoundControl)

Binds the DataBoundControl object to the data source.
DisconnectFromDataSource()

Disconnects the data-bound control from data source events.
Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources used by the DataBoundControlDesigner object and optionally releases the managed resources.
GetDesignTimeDataSource()

Gets the design-time data source from either the associated DataSourceDesigner or the DataSource property.
GetSampleDataSource()

Gets dummy sample data to render the data-bound control on the design surface if sample data cannot be created from the DataSourceDesigner or DataSource properties.
PreFilterProperties(IDictionary)

Overridden by the designer to shadow run-time properties of the data-bound control with corresponding properties implemented by the designer.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*.
IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema(Boolean)

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema*.
IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema*.
IDataSourceProvider.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource()

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource*.
IDataSourceProvider.GetSelectedDataSource()

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider.GetSelectedDataSource*.

Constructors

  • DataBoundControlDesigner()

    Initializes a new instance of the DataBoundControlDesigner class.

    public DataBoundControlDesigner ();

Properties

  • ActionLists

    Gets the DesignerActionListCollection object for this designer.

    public override System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection ActionLists { get; }

    Property Value

    • DesignerActionListCollection

      The DesignerActionListCollection object associated with this designer.

  • DataMember

    Gets the shadowed stem.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember* property of the underlying data-bound control.

    public string DataMember { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The shadowed stem.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember* of the underlying data-bound control.

  • DataSourceDesigner

    Gets the designer of the data source of the underlying data-bound control.

    public System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner DataSourceDesigner { get; }

    Property Value

    • IDataSourceDesigner

      The designer of the data source of the underlying data-bound control.

  • DesignerView

    Gets the DesignerDataSourceView object associated with the data source of this designer.

    public System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView DesignerView { get; }

    Property Value

    • DesignerDataSourceView

      The DesignerDataSourceView object associated with the data source of this designer.

  • SampleRowCount

    Gets the number of rows that the data-bound control displays on the design surface.

    protected virtual int SampleRowCount { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The number of rows that the data-bound control displays on the design surface.

  • UseDataSourcePickerActionList

    Gets a value indicating whether the designer should include "Choose a data source" in its action list.

    protected virtual bool UseDataSourcePickerActionList { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true.

Methods

  • ConnectToDataSource()

    Disconnects events from the previous data source and connects them to the current data source.

    protected override bool ConnectToDataSource ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the data-bound control connected to a new data source; false if the data source did not change.

  • CreateDataSource()

    Invokes the standard dialog box to create a new data source control, and sets the new data source control's ID to the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID* property of the data-bound control.

    protected override void CreateDataSource ();
  • DataBind(BaseDataBoundControl)

    Binds the DataBoundControl object to the data source.

    protected override void DataBind (System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl);

    Parameters

    • dataBoundControl
      BaseDataBoundControl

      The DataBoundControl object to bind to the data source.

  • DisconnectFromDataSource()

    Disconnects the data-bound control from data source events.

    protected override void DisconnectFromDataSource ();
  • Dispose(Boolean)

    Releases the unmanaged resources used by the DataBoundControlDesigner object and optionally releases the managed resources.

    protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);

    Parameters

    • disposing
      Boolean

      true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

    Remarks

    The Dispose method unregisters the designer's event handlers from all data source events.

  • GetDesignTimeDataSource()

    Gets the design-time data source from either the associated DataSourceDesigner or the DataSource property.

    protected virtual System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeDataSource ();

    Returns

    • IEnumerable

      An object that implements an IEnumerable interface referencing the design-time data source.

  • GetSampleDataSource()

    Gets dummy sample data to render the data-bound control on the design surface if sample data cannot be created from the DataSourceDesigner or DataSource properties.

    protected virtual System.Collections.IEnumerable GetSampleDataSource ();

    Returns

    • IEnumerable

      An object that implements the IEnumerable interface containing dummy sample data used to render the data-bound control on the design surface.

  • PreFilterProperties(IDictionary)

    Overridden by the designer to shadow run-time properties of the data-bound control with corresponding properties implemented by the designer.

    protected override void PreFilterProperties (System.Collections.IDictionary properties);

    Parameters

    • properties
      IDictionary

      An IDictionary object containing the properties to filter.

    Remarks

    Override the PreFilterProperties method to perform any additional actions required when the data source of the underlying data-bound control changes.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*.

    bool System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema { get; }

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the designer can refresh the data source; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataBoundControlDesigner instance is cast to an IDataBindingSchemaProvider interface.

  • IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema(Boolean)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema*.

    void IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema (bool preferSilent);

    Parameters

    • preferSilent
      Boolean

      Indicates whether to suppress any events raised while refreshing the schema.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataBoundControlDesigner instance is cast to an IDataBindingSchemaProvider interface.

  • IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema*.

    System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema { get; }

    Returns

    • IDataSourceViewSchema

      An IDataSourceViewSchema object that describes the data source.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataBoundControlDesigner instance is cast to an IDataBindingSchemaProvider interface.

  • IDataSourceProvider.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource*.

    System.Collections.IEnumerable IDataSourceProvider.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource ();

    Returns

    • IEnumerable

      The selected data member from the selected data source, if the control allows the user to select an IListSource object (such as a DataSet object) for the data source, and provides a stem.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember* property to select a particular list (or DataTable object) within the data source.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataBoundControlDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceProvider interface.

  • IDataSourceProvider.GetSelectedDataSource()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider.GetSelectedDataSource*.

    object IDataSourceProvider.GetSelectedDataSource ();

    Returns

    • Object

      An object implementing an IEnumerable interface containing the design-time stem.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource* property of the associated control, or null if a data source is not found.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataBoundControlDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceProvider interface.
